Text: JMWAVE or JM/WAVE or JM WAVE was the codename for a major secret United States covert operations and intelligence gathering station operated by the CIA from 1961 until 1968.
Triplets:<JMWAVE

<Text: JMWAVE:  It was headquartered in Building 25 on the South Campus of the University of Miami in Miami, Florida.>
